data.meta_description: Learn about Salma Hayek on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that include Salma Hayek including Puss In Boots: The Last Wish, Puss in Boots and more.
data.text:
Flu Shot

A flu outbreak hits the TGS staff, and Jack must decide who will get a vaccination and who won't.

SeÃ±or Macho Solo

Jenna thinks Liz is only attracted to a guy because she wants a child, while Jack helps Tracy and his wife Angie develop a post-nup. Jack also helps get Jenna an audition to play Janis Joplin.

Generalissimo

Jack's resemblance to an evil telenovela character has him on the outs with Elisa's grandmother, and Liz tries to begin a relationship with a new neighbour after accidentally receiving his mail.

St. Valentine's Day

Liz insists that she and Drew have their first official date on Valentine's Day, and Elisa brings Jack to church to celebrate the day, which is very different from the way he traditionally celebrates.
